doc:
Joan Chen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Chen 0 Joan Chen (born April 26, 1961) is a Chinese American actress, film director, screenwriter, and film producer. In China she performed in the 1979 film Little Flower ("小花") and came to attention for her performance in the 1987 film The Last Emperor. She is also known for her roles in Twin Peaks, Red Rose, White Rose, Saving Face, and The Home Song Stories, and for directing the feature film Xiu Xiu: The Sent Down Girl. Joan_Chen ( born April_26_,_1961 ) is a_Chinese_American_actress , film_director , screenwriter , and film_producer . In China she performed in the_1979_film Little_Flower_(_"_小花_"_) and came to attention for her_performance in the_1987_film The_Last_Emperor . She is_also_known for her_roles in Twin_Peaks , Red_Rose , White_Rose , Saving_Face , and The_Home_Song_Stories , and for directing the_feature_film_Xiu_Xiu : The_Sent_Down_Girl .
